GenericDialogAddin
public class GenericDialogAddin.SpinnerPanel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.TextListener
A class that attaches a "spinner" widget to a GenericDialog.addNumericField's TextField

LazzyIzzi

    • addSpinner

      public java.awt.Panel addSpinner​(java.awt.TextField numericField, java.lang.String numericFieldName, java.lang.Double increment)
      Adds a spinner panel to a GenericDialog.addNumericField component
      e.g.
      gd.addNumericField("DegC", 50);
      gd.addToSameRow(); //Optional
      gd.addPanel(new SpinnerPanel().addSpinner((TextField)gd.getNumericFields().get(index),1.0));
      where index is the zero-based current count of addNumericField items in the dialog.
      Note: A GenericDialog NumericField is actually a Java TextField
      Parameters:
      numericField - A NumericField added by GenericDialog.addNumericField
      numericFieldName - assign this name to the numericField, if "null", the numericField will be named "spinVal"
      increment - The increment for the spinner parameter
      Returns:
      a panel containing a label, a value, a "+" button, a "-" button and an increment

    • textValueChanged

      public void textValueChanged​(java.awt.event.TextEvent e)
